original_text: I found that the accusation had to do with questions about their law, but there was no charge against him that deserved death or imprisonment.
korean_text: 고발하는 것이 그들의 율법 문제에 관한 것뿐이요 한 가지도 죽이거나 결박할 사유가 없음을 발견하였나이다

sentences.original_text: I found that the accusation had to do with questions
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그 고발이 질문과 관련이 있다는 것을 발견했습니다

sentences.original_text: but there was no charge against him
